<title level="1" right="Trait">[Metropolis](/Traits.aspx?ID=650)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup>

Settlements with this trait are the largest of cities, often with a level of 8 or higher.
name: Metropolis
